content: A new proposal has been announced: Make AST->HIR lowering incremental #452. It will be announced at the next meeting to try and draw attention to it, but usually MCPs are not discussed during triage meetings. If you think this would benefit from discussion amongst the team, consider proposing a design meeting.
@cjgillot you can add me as a reviewer to the proposal. I certainly want to be up-to-date with whatever happens here :)
@T-compiler: Proposal #452 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.
